name: Astero
description:
Overview
Collect power ups, dodge threats, and blast away at asteroids and alien objects in this survival game.

Enemies
Asteroids , many alien objects and even UFO`s.

Levels
Go through the 20 levels and more to come soon. The game get more difficult to overcome as you progress through the levels.

Power Items
Colect all 4 power up items that protect you, fill your life and even give you multiple projectiles to advance faster and easier.

Other Features
Collect as many points as possible.
Boost your points with bonus levels.
Fight and destroy strong bosses.
